Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to longhorn-system/DaemonSet/longhorn-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: longhorn-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: longhorn
    app.kubernetes.io/name: longhorn
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.5.3
  name: longhorn-manager
  namespace: longhorn-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: longhorn-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: longhorn-manager
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: longhorn
        app.kubernetes.io/name: longhorn
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.5.3
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - longhorn-manager
        - -d
        - daemon
        - --engine-image
        - longhornio/longhorn-engine:v1.5.3
        - --instance-manager-image
        - longhornio/longhorn-instance-manager:v1.5.3
        - --share-manager-image
        - longhornio/longhorn-share-manager:v1.5.3
        - --backing-image-manager-image
        - longhornio/backing-image-manager:v1.5.3
        - --support-bundle-manager-image
        - longhornio/support-bundle-kit:v0.0.25
        - --manager-image
        - longhornio/longhorn-manager:v1.5.3
        - --service-account
        - longhorn-service-account
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: longhornio/longhorn-manager:v1.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: longhorn-manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9500
          name: manager
        - containerPort: 9501
          name: conversion-wh
        - containerPort: 9502
          name: admission-wh
        - containerPort: 9503
          name: recov-backend
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /v1/healthz
            port: 9501
            scheme: HTTPS
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/dev/
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /host/proc/
          name: proc
        - mountPath: /var/lib/longhorn/
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: longhorn
        - mountPath: /tls-files/
          name: longhorn-grpc-tls
      nodeSelector:
        longhorn: "true"
      serviceAccountName: longhorn-service-account
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev/
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc/
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/longhorn/
        name: longhorn
      - name: longhorn-grpc-tls
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: longhorn-grpc-tls
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 100%!
(MISSING)
---

##### FILE: longhorn51_37.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to longhorn-system/Deployment/longhorn-driver-deployer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: longhorn
    app.kubernetes.io/name: longhorn
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.5.3
  name: longhorn-driver-deployer
  namespace: longhorn-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: longhorn-driver-deployer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: longhorn-driver-deployer
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: longhorn
        app.kubernetes.io/name: longhorn
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.5.3
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - longhorn-manager
        - -d
        - deploy-driver
        - --manager-image
        - longhornio/longhorn-manager:v1.5.3
        - --manager-url
        - http://longhorn-backend:9500/v1
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: CSI_ATTACHER_IMAGE
          value: longhornio/csi-attacher:v4.2.0
        - name: CSI_PROVISIONER_IMAGE
          value: longhornio/csi-provisioner:v3.4.1
        - name: CSI_NODE_DRIVER_REGISTRAR_IMAGE
          value: longhornio/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.7.0
        - name: CSI_RESIZER_IMAGE
          value: longhornio/csi-resizer:v1.7.0
        - name: CSI_SNAPSHOTTER_IMAGE
          value: longhornio/csi-snapshotter:v6.2.1
        - name: CSI_LIVENESS_PROBE_IMAGE
          value: longhornio/livenessprobe:v2.9.0
        image: longhornio/longhorn-manager:v1.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: longhorn-driver-deployer
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - while [ $(curl -m 1 -s -o /dev/null -w "%!{(MISSING)http_code}" http://longhorn-backend:9500/v1)
          != "200" ]; do echo waiting; sleep 2; done
        image: longhornio/longhorn-manager:v1.5.3
        name: wait-longhorn-manager
      nodeSelector:
        longhorn: "true"
      securityContext:
        runAsUser: 0
      serviceAccountName: longhorn-service-account

---

##### FILE: longhorn51_38.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to longhorn-system/Deployment/longhorn-ui:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: longhorn-ui
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: longhorn
    app.kubernetes.io/name: longhorn
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.5.3
  name: longhorn-ui
  namespace: longhorn-system
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: longhorn-ui
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: longhorn-ui
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: longhorn
        app.kubernetes.io/name: longhorn
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.5.3
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - longhorn-ui
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 1
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: LONGHORN_MANAGER_IP
          value: http://longhorn-backend:9500
        - name: LONGHORN_UI_PORT
          value: "8000"
        image: longhornio/longhorn-ui:v1.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: longhorn-ui
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/cache/nginx/
          name: nginx-cache
        - mountPath: /var/config/nginx/
          name: nginx-config
        - mountPath: /var/run/
          name: var-run
      nodeSelector:
        longhorn: "true"
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: nginx-cache
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: nginx-config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: var-run

---

          valueFrom:

              name: active-profile

          value: Asia/Kolkata

        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: lost-article-app

          protocol: TCP

          limits:

            memory: 500Mi

            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: lots.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/lots:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: lots
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1000
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: lots
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: lots
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sleep
        - infinity
        image: busybox
        name: sleep
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: low-multi-node.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/low-multi-node:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: low-multi-node
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 6
  parallelism: 6
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        job: low-multi-node
      name: stress-ng-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apt-get update && apt-get install -y stress-ng && stress-ng --cpu 1 --timeout
          120s --metrics-brief
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu:latest
        name: stress-ng-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: low-single-node.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/low-single-node:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: low-single-node
  namespace: default
spec:
  backoffLimit: 4
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 6
  parallelism: 6
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        job: low-single-node
      name: stress-ng-pod
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - kind-worker2
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - apt-get update && apt-get install -y stress-ng && stress-ng --cpu 1 --timeout
          120s --metrics-brief
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu:latest
        name: stress-ng-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: lrp-test.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/k8s1-backend:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    id: be1
    role: backend
  name: k8s1-backend
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver:1.10.1
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: web
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      name: http
      protocol: TCP
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 80
  - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver-udp:v2020.01.30
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: udp
    ports:
    - containerPort: 69
      name: tftp
      protocol: UDP
  nodeSelector:
    cilium.io/ci-node: k8s1
  terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0

---

metadata:
  labels:
    id: be2
    role: backend
  name: k8s2-backend
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver:1.10.1
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: web
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      name: http
      protocol: TCP
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /
        port: 80
  - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver-udp:v2020.01.30
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: udp
    ports:
    - containerPort: 69
      name: tftp
      protocol: UDP
  nodeSelector:
    cilium.io/ci-node: k8s2
  terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0

##### FILE: lrs-disk-deploy_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-lrs:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-lrs
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-lrs
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-lrs
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo $(date) >> /mnt/azuredisk/outfile; sleep 1; done
        image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/azuredisk
          name: azuredisk-lrs
      volumes:
      - name: azuredisk-lrs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: azure-managed-disk-lrs

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/ls:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: ls
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: guarnier-ls.my.kube.um.edu.ar
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: ls
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: ls_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/ls:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: ls
  name: ls
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ls
  serviceName: ls
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: ls
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PUID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PUID
              name: ls-config1
        - name: PGID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PGID
              name: ls-config1
        - name: TZ
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: TZ
              name: ls-config1
        image: linuxserver/mstream:5.11.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: linuxserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: ls
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
        - mountPath: /music
          name: music
        - mountPath: /music/example
          name: music-example
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - rm
        - -rf
        - /music/lost+found
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /music
          name: music
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: music1.mp3
            path: music1.mp3
          - key: music2.mp3
            path: music2.mp3
          name: music-example
        name: music-example
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: config
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
  - metadata:
      name: music
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
status:
  replicas: 1

---

    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:

  - metadata:
      name: music
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
status:
  replicas: 1

##### FILE: lsr-backup-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to <lsr namespace>/Deployment/lsr-backup:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: lsr-data
  name: lsr-backup
  namespace: <lsr namespace>
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: lsr-data
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        backup.velero.io/backup-volumes: lsr-backup
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/command: '["sh", "-c", "/lsr/br_lsr.sh <lsr namespace>
          restore"]'
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/exec-timeout: 300s
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/timeout: 600s
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/wait-timeout: 300s
        pre.hook.backup.velero.io/command: '["sh", "-c", "rm -rf /lsr/lsr-backup/database;
          /lsr/br_lsr.sh <lsr namespace> backup"]'
        pre.hook.backup.velero.io/timeout: 300s
      labels:
        foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: lsr-data
      name: lsr-backup
      namespace: <lsr namespace>
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - sleep infinity
        image: icr.io/cpopen/cpfs/cpfs-utils:4.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: lsr-backup-job
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 512Mi
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            ephemeral-storage: 128Mi
            memory: 256Mi
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /lsr/lsr-backup/
          name: lsr-backup-mount
        - mountPath: /lsr
          name: scripts
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccount: lsr-backup-sa
      serviceAccountName: lsr-backup-sa
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: lsr-backup-mount
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: lsr-backup-pvc
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 511
          name: lsr-br-configmap
        name: scripts

---

##### FILE: lsr-br-scripts-cm.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to <lsr namespace>/ConfigMap/lsr-br-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  br_lsr.sh: |
    #!/usr/bin/env bash

    # Licensed Materials - Property of IBM
    # Copyright IBM Corporation 2023. All Rights Reserved
    # US Government Users Restricted Rights -
    # Use, duplication or disclosure restricted by GSA ADP Schedule Contract with IBM Corp.
    #
    # This is an internal component, bundled with an official IBM product.
    # Please refer to that particular license for additional information.

    # ---------- Command arguments ----------

    set -o errtrace
    set -o errexit

    LSR_NAMESPACE=$1
    MODE=$2

    BACKUP_DIR=/lsr/lsr-backup

    function main {
        if [[ $MODE == "backup" ]]; then
            info "Mode set to backup, beginning backup process."
            backup
            success "Backup completed successfully."
        else if [[ $MODE == "restore" ]]
            info "Mode is set to restore, beginning restore process."
            restore
            success "Restore completed successfully."
        else
            error "Invalid mode entered. Please specify \"backup\" or \"restore\"."
        fi
    }

    function backup {
        mkdir -p $BACKUP_DIR/database
        CNPG_PRIMARY_POD=`oc get pods -n $LSR_NAMESPACE | grep ibm-license-service-reporter-instance | awk '{print $1}'` && \
        oc -n $LSR_NAMESPACE exec -t $CNPG_PRIMARY_POD -c database -- rm -rf /run/lsr_backup && \
        oc -n $LSR_NAMESPACE exec -t $CNPG_PRIMARY_POD -c database -- mkdir -p /run/lsr_backup && \
        oc -n $LSR_NAMESPACE exec -t $CNPG_PRIMARY_POD -c database -- pg_dump -v --username=postgres --dbname=postgres -f /run/lsr_backup/lsr_db_backup.dump --format=c

        #Move backup to backup location
        oc cp $LSR_NAMESPACE/$CNPG_PRIMARY_POD:/run/lsr_backup/lsr_db_backup.dump $BACKUP_DIR/database/lsr_db_backup.dump
    }

    function restore {
        CNPG_PRIMARY_POD=`oc get pods -n $LSR_NAMESPACE | grep ibm-license-service-reporter-instance | awk '{print $1}'`
        oc exec $CNPG_PRIMARY_POD -n $LSR_NAMESPACE -- mkdir -p /run/lsr_backup
        oc cp $BACKUP_DIR/database/lsr_db_backup.dump $LSR_NAMESPACE/$CNPG_PRIMARY_POD:/run/lsr_backup/lsr_db_backup.dump
        oc -n $LSR_NAMESPACE exec -t $CNPG_PRIMARY_POD -c database -- psql -U postgres -c "\list" -c "\dn" -c "\du"
        oc -n $LSR_NAMESPACE exec -t $CNPG_PRIMARY_POD -c database -- pg_restore -U postgres --dbname postgres --format=c --clean -v /run/lsr_backup/lsr_db_backup.dump
        oc -n $LSR_NAMESPACE exec -t $CNPG_PRIMARY_POD -c database -- psql -U postgres -c "\list" -c "\dn" -c "\du"
    }

    function msg() {
        printf '%!b(MISSING)\n' "$1"
    }

    function success() {
        msg "\33[32m[] ${1}\33[0m"
    }

    function warning() {
        msg "\33[33m[] ${1}\33[0m"
    }

    function error() {
        msg "\33[31m[] ${1}\33[0m"
        exit 1
    }

    function title() {
        msg "\33[34m# ${1}\33[0m"
    }

    function info() {
        msg "[INFO] ${1}"
    }

    main $*
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: lsr-data
  name: lsr-br-configmap
  namespace: <lsr namespace>

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: lsyncd-lua-config.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mailserver/ConfigMap/updconf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  config.sh: |
    #!/bin/sh
    name=$(sed "s/[^a-z-]//g" /modconf/hostname)
    num=$(sed -r "s/[^0-9]//g" /modconf/hostname)
    for i in `seq 0 $(($INST - 1))`
    do
      if [ $name$i = $HOSTNAME ]
      then
        continue
      fi
      repstring=$repstring"sync {@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"    default.rsyncssh,@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"    source = \"/mail\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"    host = \"$name$i.$SVC.$NS.$CLUSTER\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"    targetdir = \"/mail\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"    delay = 5,@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"    rsync = {@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"        verbose = true,@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"        inplace = true,@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"        _extra = {@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"            \"--info=progress2\"@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"        }@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"     },@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"     ssh = {@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"         identityFile = \"/root/.ssh/id_rsa\",@LB@"
      #repstring=$repstring"         identityFile = \"home/vmail/.ssh/id_rsa\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"         options = {@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"             User = \"root\",@LB@"
      #repstring=$repstring"             User = \"vmail\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"             StrictHostKeyChecking = \"no\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"             Compression = \"no\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"             Cipher = \"aes256-gcm@openssh.com\"@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"         },@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"         _extra = {@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"             \"-T\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"             \"-c\",@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"             \"aes256-gcm@openssh.com\"@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"         }@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"    }@LB@"
      repstring=$repstring"}@LB@"
    done
    echo "$repstring" >> /modconf/lsyncd.lua
    sed -i "s/@LB@/\n/g" /modconf/lsyncd.lua
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: updconf
  namespace: mailserver

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: lumba-api.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/lumba-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: lumba-api
  name: lumba-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: lumba-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: lumba-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - gunicorn --bind :8000 --workers 2 --threads 4 lumba_api_v2.wsgi:application
        env:
        - name: TRAINING_API_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongo-url
              name: lumba-model-config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: lumba-secret
        image: gbhisma/lumba-api-v2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: lumba-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: lumba-api

---

##### FILE: lumba-celery-flower.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/celery-flower:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: celery-flower
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: celery-flower
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: celery-flower
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - celery -A modeling flower -l info --persistent=True
        env:
        - name: BACKEND_API_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: api-url
              name: lumba-api-config
        - name: REDIS_ENDPOINT_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_ENDPOINT_URL
              name: lumba-secret
        image: gbhisma/lumba-model
        name: celery-flower
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5555
          name: lumba-flower

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

    app: lumba-web
  name: lumba-web-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: lumba-web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: lumba-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_NODE_ENV
          value: DEVELOPMENT
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: web-url
              name: lumba-web-config
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_API_ROUTE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: api-url
              name: lumba-api-config
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: lumba-secret
        image: gbhisma/lumba-web
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: lumba-web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: lumba-web

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: lumba-worker-xgboost
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: lumba-worker-xgboost
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: lumba-worker-xgboost
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - python3 manage.py rqworker xgboost
        env:
        - name: REDIS_QUEUE_DEFAULT
          value: "7"
        - name: REDIS_QUEUE_XGBOOST
          value: "8"
        - name: BACKEND_API_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: api-url
              name: lumba-api-config
        - name: REDIS_ENDPOINT_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_ENDPOINT_URL
              name: lumba-secret
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: lumba-secret
        image: gbhisma/lumba-model
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: lumba-worker-xgboost

##### FILE: luxxy-covid-testing-system_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/luxxy-covid-testing-system:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: luxxy-covid-testing-system
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: luxxy-covid-testing-system
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: luxxy-covid-testing-system
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: luxxy-covid-config
        image: gcr.io/imersao-cloud-413121/luxxy-covid-testing-system-app-pt:latest
        name: luxxy-covid-testing-system
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

---

          value: postgres

  namespace: mymicroservices

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mailhog
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mailhog
      name: mailhog
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mailhog/mailhog:latest
        name: mailhog
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1025
          name: smtp
        - containerPort: 8025
          name: web
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 32Mi
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 20

##### FILE: mailserver.example.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mail/Deployment/mailserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mailserver
  namespace: mail
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mailserver
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mailserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SSL_TYPE
          value: manual
        - name: SSL_CERT_PATH
          value: /certs/tls.crt
        - name: SSL_KEY_PATH
          value: /certs/tls.key
        - name: LOG_LEVEL
          value: trace
        - name: POSTMASTER_ADDRESS
          value: postmaster@prayujt.com
        - name: LDAP_START_TLS
          value: "yes"
        - name: LDAP_SERVER_HOST
          value: ldaps://mail.prayujt.com
        - name: OVERRIDE_HOSTNAME
          value: mail.prayujt.com
        - name: LETSENCRYPT_DOMAIN
          value: mail.prayujt.com
        - name: POSTFIX_REJECT_UNKNOWN_CLIENT_HOSTNAME
          value: "1"
        - name: PERMIT_DOCKER
          value: none
        - name: TLS_LEVEL
          value: intermediate
        - name: NETWORK_INTERFACE
          value: enp3s0
        - name: RELAY_HOST
          value: ""
        - name: RELAY_PORT
          value: ""
        - name: RELAY_USER
          value: ""
        - name: RELAY_PASSWORD
          value: ""
        image: ghcr.io/docker-mailserver/docker-mailserver:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - sh
            - -c
            - ss --listening --tcp | grep -P 'LISTEN.+:smtp' || exit 1
          failureThreshold: 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: mailserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 25
        - containerPort: 143
        - containerPort: 465
        - containerPort: 587
        - containerPort: 993
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/mail/
          name: mail-data
        - mountPath: /var/mail-state/
          name: mail-state
        - mountPath: /var/log/mail/
          name: mail-logs
        - mountPath: /tmp/docker-mailserver/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: tls-secret
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: server-master
      volumes:
      - name: mail-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mail-data-pvc
      - name: mail-state
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mail-state-pvc
      - name: mail-logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mail-logs-pvc
      - name: config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mail-config-pvc
      - name: tls-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mail-prayujt-tls
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
        name: localtime

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource mail/Deployment/mailserver
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource mail/Deployment/mailserver failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource mail/Deployment/mailserver failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource mail/Deployment/mailserver failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: mailserver.example_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mail/Service/mailserver-service:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: mailserver-service
  namespace: mail
spec:
  ports:
  - name: smtp
    port: 25
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 25
  - name: imap
    port: 143
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 143
  - name: esmtp-implicit-tls
    port: 465
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 465
  - name: esmtp-explicit-tls
    port: 587
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 587
  - name: imap4-implicit-tls
    port: 993
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 993
  selector:
    app: mailserver
  type: ClusterIP

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: prometheus-de
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: prometheus
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: prom/prometheus:v2.31.0
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/
          name: prometheus-config-volume
        - mountPath: /var/lib/prometheus/
          name: prometheus-data-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: prometheus-config
        name: prometheus-config-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: prometheus-data-volume

---

##### FILE: main486_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to external-dns/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    operator.1password.io/auto-restart: "true"
    operator.1password.io/item-name: pihole-credentials
    operator.1password.io/item-path: vaults/homelab/items/pihole-credentials
  name: external-dns
  namespace: external-dns
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=service
        - --source=ingress
        - --registry=noop
        - --policy=upsert-only
        - --provider=pihole
        - --pihole-server=http://pihole.kng.rocks
        env:
        - name: EXTERNAL_DNS_PIHOLE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: pihole-credentials
        image: registry.k8s.io/external-dns/external-dns:v0.14.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: external-dns
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 64Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 65534
      serviceAccountName: external-dns

---

##### FILE: main487_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to heimdall/Deployment/heimdall:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: heimdall
  name: heimdall
  namespace: heimdall
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: heimdall
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: heimdall
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PUID
          value: "1000"
        - name: PGID
          value: "1000"
        image: linuxserver/heimdall:2.6.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: heimdall
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - name: config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: heimdall-config

---

            memory: 128Mi
          requests:

            memory: 64Mi

          "chain_name": "mainnet"

##### FILE: mainnet2.expect_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to testing/ConfigMap/tezos-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  ARCHIVE_TARBALL_URL: ""
  CHAIN_NAME: mainnet
  CHAIN_PARAMS: |
    {
      "bootstrap_peers": [],
      "default_bootstrap_mutez": "4000000000000",
      "expected-proof-of-work": 26,
      "network": {
          "chain_name": "mainnet"
        },
      "protocol_activation": null
    }
  FULL_SNAPSHOT_URL: ""
  FULL_TARBALL_URL: ""
  NODE_GLOBALS: |
    {
      "config": {},
      "env": {
        "all": {
          "key": "outer-value"
        },
        "octez-node": {
          "TEZOS_LOG": "* -\u003e DEBUG"
        },
        "snapshot-downloader": {
          "key": "outer-container"
        }
      }
    }
  NODES: |
    {
      "city-block": {
        "instances": [
          {}
        ],
        "runs": [
          "tezedge_node",
          "logger",
          "metrics"
        ]
      },
      "country-town": {
        "bootstrapped_liveness_probe": true,
        "bootstrapped_startup_probe": true,
        "env": {
          "all": {
            "key": "specific-pod"
          },
          "snapshot-downloader": {
            "key": "specific-container"
          }
        },
        "images": {
          "octez": "tezos/tezos:v15-release"
        },
        "instances": [
          {
            "config": {
              "shell": {
                "history_mode": "rolling"
              }
            }
          },
          {
            "config": {
              "shell": {
                "history_mode": {
                  "rolling": {
                    "additional_cycles": 5
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        ],
        "resources": {
          "limits": {
            "memory": "16192Mi"
          },
          "requests": {
            "memory": "16192Mi"
          }
        },
        "runs": [
          "octez_node",
          "logger",
          "metrics"
        ]
      }
    }
  OCTEZ_BAKERS: |
    {}
  OCTEZ_ROLLUP_NODES: |
    {}
  OCTEZ_SIGNERS: |
    {}
  OCTEZ_VERSION: tezos/tezos:octez-v20.2
  PREFER_TARBALLS: "false"
  ROLLING_SNAPSHOT_URL: ""
  ROLLING_TARBALL_URL: ""
  SNAPSHOT_METADATA_NETWORK_NAME: ""
  SNAPSHOT_SOURCE: https://snapshots.tezos.marigold.dev/api/tezos-snapshots.json
  TACOINFRA_SIGNERS: |
    {}
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: tezos-config
  namespace: testing

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: maintenance-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: maintenance-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: maintenance-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/magicalfruit/maintenance-pod:main
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: smb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 445
        - containerPort: 139
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/longhorn/sonarr
          name: sonarr
      volumes:
      - name: sonarr
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: sonarr-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mall-admin-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mall-admin-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mall-admin
  name: mall-admin-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mall-admin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mall-admin
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: spring.profiles.active
          value: prod
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        - name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.server-addr
          value: http://192.168.3.101:8848
        - name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.server-addr
          value: http://192.168.3.101:8848

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/maloth:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: maloth
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/maloth:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: maloth
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: projectsveltos
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: manager1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: telemetry-controller
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: k8s-hello-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: k8s-hello-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager101_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: stale-secrets-watch
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: stale-secrets-watch
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: SLACK_BOT_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SLACK_BOT_TOKEN
              name: slack-bot-secret
        - name: SLACK_CHANNEL_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SLACK_CHANNEL_ID
              name: slack-bot-secret
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 20
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager104_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kube-mock
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-mock
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /kubemock
        - manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      nodeSelector:
        node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane: ""
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists

---

##### FILE: manager105_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: gobackup-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: gobackup-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: homer-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: homer-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

  namespace: system

    matchLabels:
      control-plane: non-admin-controller

    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: non-admin-controller

        - --leader-elect

##### FILE: manager108_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: spacelift-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: spacelift-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /spacelift-operator
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager109_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator-lifecycle-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kafka-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kafka-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kafka-operator
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kafka-operator
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACES
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.annotations['olm.targetNamespaces']
        - name: OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

metadata:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

##### FILE: manager111_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: imagedeployment
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: imagedeployment
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/


pass: 10, fail: 5, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 2

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: cornjob
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: cornjob
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

  namespace: system

##### FILE: manager114_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: guestbook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: guestbook
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-kubernetes-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    email: support@mongodb.com
  labels:
    owner: mongodb
  name: mongodb-kubernetes-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mongodb-kubernetes-operator
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mongodb-kubernetes-operator
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: name
                operator: In
                values:
                - mongodb-kubernetes-operator
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - command:
        - /usr/local/bin/entrypoint
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: mongodb-kubernetes-operator
        - name: AGENT_IMAGE
          value: quay.io/mongodb/mongodb-agent:107.0.0.8465-1
        - name: VERSION_UPGRADE_HOOK_IMAGE
          value: quay.io/mongodb/mongodb-kubernetes-operator-version-upgrade-post-start-hook:1.0.8
        - name: READINESS_PROBE_IMAGE
          value: quay.io/mongodb/mongodb-kubernetes-readinessprobe:1.0.17
        - name: MONGODB_IMAGE
          value: mongodb-community-server
        - name: MONGODB_REPO_URL
          value: quay.io/mongodb
        image: quay.io/mongodb/mongodb-kubernetes-operator:0.9.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mongodb-kubernetes-operator
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1100m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 2000
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: mongodb-kubernetes-operator

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: hugo-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: hugo-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --leader-election-id=hugo-operator
        env:
        - name: ANSIBLE_GATHERING
          value: explicit
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 6789
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 6789
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 768Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

  - default:

##### FILE: manager118_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: o11y-rules-telemetry-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: o11y-rules-telemetry-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager119_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: etcd-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: etcd-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: ghcr.io/aenix-io/etcd-operator:v0.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager121_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator-lifecycle-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: hdfs-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: hdfs-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: hdfs-operator
      control-plane: hdfs-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: hdfs-operator
        control-plane: hdfs-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator-lifecycle-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: hbase-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: hbase-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: hbase-operator
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: hbase-operator
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
