apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubernetes-email-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: email-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubernetes-email-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: email-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 800m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

            drop:
            - ALL

    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: port-bridge
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

        control-plane: controller-manager

        - --leader-elect

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/system:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: system
spec:

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/system:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: system
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

##### FILE: manager128_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: squest-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: squest-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --leader-election-id=squest-operator
        env:
        - name: ANSIBLE_GATHERING
          value: explicit
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 6789
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 6789
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 768Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/


pass: 10, fail: 5, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 2

##### FILE: manager129_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: deep-ployment-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: deep-ployment-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --leader-election-id=deep-ployment-operator
        env:
        - name: ANSIBLE_GATHERING
          value: explicit
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 6789
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 6789
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 768Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

##### FILE: manager13_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubesync
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubesync
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: chucknorrisjoke-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: chucknorrisjoke-controller
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:

##### FILE: manager131_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubewiremesh
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubewiremesh
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: instaslicev2
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: instaslicev2
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: asm582/instaslicev2-controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: false
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager132_2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/DaemonSet/controller-daemonset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: controller-daemonset
  name: controller-daemonset
  namespace: system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: controller-daemonset
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: daemonset
      labels:
        app: controller-daemonset
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /daemonset
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: NVIDIA_MIG_CONFIG_DEVICES
          value: all
        image: asm582/instaslicev2-daemonset:latest
        name: daemonset
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - ALL
          privileged: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: false
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager134_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: manager135_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: github-token-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: github-token-manager
    control-plane: manager
  name: manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /ko-app/manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: config
        secret:
          defaultMode: 444
          secretName: gtm-config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: gameserver-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: gameserver-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: system
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: manager137_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: jaeger
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: jaeger
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kafka-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kafka-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager14_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: polyfea-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: polyfea-controller
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8082
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  name: allow-dns
  namespace: system

##### FILE: manager140_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: scaleroperator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: scaleroperator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: cronjob
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: cronjob
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager143_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: autoscaling-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: autoscaling-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager144.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect=true
        - --zap-devel=false
        - --zap-log-level=info
        - --zap-encoder=console
        - --zap-stacktrace-level=panic
        command:
        - /manager
        image: registry.local/backup-operator:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60

---

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

##### FILE: manager147_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: REPO_EMBEDDER_CONTAINER_IMAGE
          value: repository-embedder:0.0.1
        - name: MODEL_DEPLOYER_CONTAINER_IMAGE
          value: model-deployer:0.0.1
        image: controller:0.0.1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager148_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator-powercapping
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: operator-powercapping
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: env-secrets
        image: quay.io/climatik-project/climatik-controller
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

        - --leader-elect

            - ALL

          name: metrics

##### FILE: manager152_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: notifik
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: notifik
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: notifik
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        ports: []
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts: []
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes: []

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/


pass: 12, fail: 4, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: broom
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: broom
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: validator-plugin-kubescape
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: validator-plugin-kubescape
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager156_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: validator-plugin-kubescape
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: validator-plugin-kubescape
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager158_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: github-app-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: github-app-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: CHECK_INTERVAL
          value: 5m
        - name: EXPIRY_THRESHOLD
          value: 15m
        - name: DEBUG_LOG
          value: "false"
        - name: VAULT_ROLE
          value: githubapp
        - name: VAULT_ROLE_AUDIENCE
          value: githubapp
        - name: VAULT_ADDR
          value: http://vault.default:8200
        - name: GITHUB_PROXY
          value: ""
        - name: VAULT_NAMESPACE
          value: ""
        - name: VAULT_PROXY_ADDR
          value: ""
        - name: ENABLE_WEBHOOKS
          value: "true"
        image: controller
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/github-app-secrets
          name: github-app-secrets
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 65532
        runAsGroup: 65532
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65532
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: github-app-secrets

---

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  labels:

##### FILE: manager159_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator-lifecycle-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: superset-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: superset-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: superset-operator
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: superset-operator
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACES
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.annotations['olm.targetNamespaces']
        - name: OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: j
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: j
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: reg.jobico.org/controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: reg-cred-secret
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: vernal-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager

  namespace: system

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager

    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager

          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

            drop:
            - ALL

        runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

##### FILE: manager165_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: ensemble-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ensemble-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubebuilder
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubebuilder
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager

          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager168_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubedns-shepherd
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubedns-shepherd
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=127.0.0.1:8080
        - --leader-elect
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager169_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: gameserver-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: gameserver-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager171_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: oracle-ords-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: oracle-ords-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 10001
          runAsUser: 10001
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 10001
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10001
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager173_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator-lifecycle-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: dolphinscheduler-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: dolphinscheduler-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: dolphinscheduler-operator
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: dolphinscheduler-operator
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACES
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.annotations['olm.targetNamespaces']
        - name: OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager175_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: uptime-robot-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: uptime-robot-operator
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: uptime-robot-operator
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        ports: []
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts: []
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes: []

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/


pass: 13, fail: 3, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1
