##### FILE: manager176_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: books-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: books-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager177_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: kubeeye-controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: kubeeye-controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: kubeeye-controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /kubeeye/data
          name: inspect-result
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: inspect-result
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: inspect-result
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
        name: localtime

---

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: manager178_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: sql-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: sql-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager179_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: argocd-operator
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: argocd-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        control-plane: argocd-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.annotations['olm.targetNamespaces']
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager181_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: dynamoctl-dp-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: dynamoctl-dp-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager186_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: controller
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: application-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: application-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager188_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kube-cgi
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-cgi
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        env:
        - name: ENABLE_WEBHOOKS
          value: "false"
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager190_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: workspace-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: workspace-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager191_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kube-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:test
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: reg-cred
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - sleep 10
        image: busybox
        name: sleep
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: false
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default

metadata:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange

##### FILE: manager193_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: simulated-workload-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: simulated-workload-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/


pass: 10, fail: 5, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 2

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: app-deploy-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: app-deploy-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager196_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: memcached-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: memcached-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: MEMCACHED_IMAGE
          value: memcached:1.4.36-alpine
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager197_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: secrets-store-sync-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: secrets-store-sync-controller
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --endpoint=unix:///provider/e2e-provider.sock
        image: aramase/e2e-provider:v0.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: provider-e2e-installer
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /provider
          name: providervol
      - args:
        - --provider-volume=/provider
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=:8085
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /secrets-store-sync-controller
        env:
        - name: SYNC_CONTROLLER_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: SYNC_CONTROLLER_POD_UID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.uid
        - name: SYNC_CONTROLLER_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: controller:v0.0.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8085
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /provider
          name: providervol
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ssc-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/run/secrets-store-sync-providers
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: providervol

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /bin/operator
        env:
        - name: OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ENABLE_WEBHOOKS
          value: "true"
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 192Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: test
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: test
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: manager20_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to backsnap/Deployment/backsnap-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: backsnap
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: backsnap
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: backsnap
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: backsnap-operator
  namespace: backsnap
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backsnap
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app: backsnap
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --s3-host
        - s3.us-west-004.backblazeb2.com
        - --s3-bucket
        - backsnap
        - --s3-access-key-id
        - 004ffef...0003
        - --s3-secret-access-key
        - K004KC/...
        - --restic-password
        - ChangeMe
        command:
        - /manager
        image: sjorsgielen/backsnap:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: system
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: manager201_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubernetes-controller-2
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubernetes-controller-2
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager

    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager

      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest

          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081

          periodSeconds: 20

            path: /readyz

            memory: 128Mi

            drop:
            - ALL

##### FILE: manager205_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to caddy-system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: caddy-gateway
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: caddy-gateway
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: caddy-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource caddy-system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource caddy-system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource caddy-system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource caddy-system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource caddy-system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource caddy-system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

##### FILE: manager206_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-rbac-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: rbac-operator
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /rbac-operator
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: rbac-operator
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager207_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: dash0-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: dash0-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: DASH0_OTEL_COLLECTOR_BASE_URL
          value: http://dash0-operator-opentelemetry-collector.dash0-system.svc.cluster.local:4318
        - name: DASH0_OPERATOR_IMAGE
          value: dash0-operator-controller:1.0.0
        - name: DASH0_INIT_CONTAINER_IMAGE
          value: ghcr.io/dash0hq/instrumentation:1.0.0
        image: dash0-operator-controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: cloudflare-kubernetes-gateway
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /ko-app/cmd
        env:
        - name: GATEWAY_IMAGE
          value: cloudflare/cloudflared:2024.11.1
        image: controller
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

            drop:
            - ALL

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  namespace: system

  limits:

      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi

##### FILE: manager209_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: dutycontroller
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: manager21_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: commons-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: commons-operator
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: commons-operator
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: axe-dmp
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: axe-dmp
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: paddy
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=0
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

##### FILE: manager216_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: sc-basic-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: manager22_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: dynowatch
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: dynowatch
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/dynowatch
          name: config
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: config
        name: config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource system/Deployment/controller-manager failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pgo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    postgres-operator.crunchydata.com/control-plane: postgres-operator
  name: pgo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      postgres-operator.crunchydata.com/control-plane: postgres-operator
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        postgres-operator.crunchydata.com/control-plane: postgres-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGO_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: CRUNCHY_DEBUG
          value: "true"
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_POSTGRES_15
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-postgres:ubi8-15.6-0
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_POSTGRES_15_GIS_3.3

          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-postgres:ubi8-16.2-0
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_POSTGRES_16_GIS_3.3
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-postgres-gis:ubi8-16.2-3.3-0
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_POSTGRES_16_GIS_3.4
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-postgres-gis:ubi8-16.2-3.4-0
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_PGADMIN
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-pgadmin4:ubi8-4.30-22
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_PGBACKREST
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-pgbackrest:ubi8-2.49-0
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_PGBOUNCER
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-pgbouncer:ubi8-1.21-3
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_PGEXPORTER
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-postgres-exporter:ubi8-0.15.0-3
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_PGUPGRADE
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-upgrade:ubi8-5.5.1-0
        - name: RELATED_IMAGE_STANDALONE_PGADMIN
          value: registry.developers.crunchydata.com/crunchydata/crunchy-pgadmin4:ubi8-7.8-3
        image: postgres-operator
        name: operator
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:

            - ALL

##### FILE: manager222_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kube-fieldforge
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-fieldforge
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
                - ppc64le
                - s390x
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 30
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager223_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: lfgw-config-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: lfgw-config-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

      control-plane: controller-manager

      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager

          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi

            - ALL

##### FILE: manager225_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: lke-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - amd64
                - arm64
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        image: ghcr.io/anza-labs/lke-operator:main
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: manager226_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ceph-csi-operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: ceph-csi-op-controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: ceph-csi-op-controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: controller
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

##### FILE: manager227_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: manager
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: controller-manager
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: deployment
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: operator
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: DB_NAME
          value: kubeconductor
        - name: DB_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: DB_ENDPOINT
          value: my-release-postgresql.default.svc.cluster.local:5432
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          value: null
        - name: JOB_TTL
          value: "180"
        image: controller:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to system/Deployment/controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kubipam
    control-plane: controller-manager
  name: controller-manager
  namespace: system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: manager
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --leader-elect
        - --health-probe-bind-address=:8081
        - --metrics-bind-address=0
        command:
        - /manager
        image: controller:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
